articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says even fit players are in pain as they push themselves through the fixture schedule.
articles.title: Man City: Players playing in pain - Guardiola

articles.description: Former Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says he wishes the club's fans "nothing but success, trophies and glory" following his sacking on Monday.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Dutchman wishes Manchester United fans 'trophies and glory' following sacking

articles.description: Manchester United appoint Sporting coach Ruben Amorim as their new head coach on a deal until June 2026.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Man Utd appoint Sporting manager as new head coach until 2027

articles.description: Oscar Piastri leads Lando Norris to a McLaren one-two in sprint qualifying at the Sao Paulo Grand Prix.
articles.title: Brazilian GP 2024: Piastri on sprint pole ahead of Norris

articles.description: England aim to prove they belong in the highest echelons of the Test game this autumn. The All Blacks are a tantalising first encounter.
articles.title: England v New Zealand: Steve Borthwick's side aim to crack elite

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka is looking to cap a superb year with a first WTA Finals triumph. Here's everything you need to know about the event - and cast your vote for the winner.
articles.title: WTA Finals 2024: Draw & preview as Sabalenka, Swiatek & Gauff head the field in Saudi Arabia

articles.description: Non-league part-timers Tamworth cause an almighty FA Cup upset to dump League One side Huddersfield Town out in the first round.
articles.title: FA Cup: Tamworth 1-0 Huddersfield Town - non-league side stun Terriers

articles.description: With Ruben Amorim appearing close to a move to Manchester United, which players will be the biggest winners and losers under him at Old Trafford?
articles.title: Ruben Amorim tactics: Man Utd winners and losers under new coach - analysis

articles.description: Championship leader Max Verstappen will have a five-place grid penalty at the Sao Paulo Grand Prix.
articles.title: Brazilian Grand Prix 2024: Verstappen handed grid penalty

articles.description: Former Manchester United forward Dwight Yorke is named Trinidad and Tobago's head coach, having played for them 72 times during his career.
articles.title: Dwight Yorke appointed Trinidad and Tobago head coach
